description:
October brings our Lightning-talks day, where we will have multiple speakers talking for 15 mins at a time about a wide range of awesome topics. This month we're hosted by the fab folk at Huboo Fulfilment in central Bristol, we'd love if you came along for a chat, and to see some talks, have some food and meet the rest of our awesome community.

**Ed Pitt -** Tech debt is good' and other heretical opinions.
**Matt Hunt** \- Azure Vision with Functions for Fun\.
**Thomas Morris** \- Umbraco \- the Friendly\, Open\-Source \.NET CMS
**Carl Sargunar -** Things I learned playing around with Docker and breaking things
**Stuart Lang** \- An introduction to Playwright \- reliable end\-to\-end testing for modern web apps\.
title: Lightning talks night [🏫 In-person]
